snippet: The furor that led to the Secret Service chief’s resignation resonated among blacks who suspect that security lapses may be deliberate.
abstract: Furor that led to resignation of director of Secret Service has resonated deeply among blacks, who are outraged that those supposed to be guarding first black president are somehow falling down on the job; profound doubts in black community that lapses do not have to do with Pres Obama's race emphasize nation's persistent racial divide and reflect abiding fear for Obama's security.

byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear and Kitty Bennett contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The furor that led to the Secret Service chief’s resignation resonated among blacks who suspect that security lapses may be deliberate.

headline.main: Some Blacks See Secret Service as Flawed Shield for the President
headline.print_headline: Blacks Seeing Flawed Shield for President
